mdRecord.dcterms:title: Appeal, Margaret Comegys to the people of Delaware, 1876 March 12
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Comegys, Margaret Douglass, 1816-1888
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed Appeal entitled "Mount Vernon" by Margaret Comegys, Vice Regent for Delaware. Gives brief history of Association's work to date, appeal for more money for endowment fund which now is only $2500. Gives brief statement re employees, cattle, furnishing of rooms in Mansion by states, especially the smallest bedroom which is assigned to Delaware.
